name: The Enforcer's Heart
description: Tony's top enforcer is in love with Tony's wife.
context: Furio Giunta, your top enforcer imported from Naples, has developed feelings for your wife Carmela. You've noticed lingering looks, awkward silences when you walk in, Carmela mentioning him more than necessary. Nothing physical has happened—Furio has kept his distance—but the attraction is obvious to anyone paying attention. Furio is your most capable and loyal soldier. Carmela has seemed distant from you lately.
prompt: You've noticed the tension between Furio and Carmela. Nothing has happened yet. What do you do?
stakes: If you act on suspicion, you lose your best enforcer. If you wait, the situation may resolve itself or escalate.
